titleStmt.title: Mr. Richard Baxter's last legacy in select admonitions and directions to all sober dissenters.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by E. Whitlock,

notesStmt.note: "To whom, being dead, he yet speaketh."
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
